title: Benson & Hedges Trophy
text:
The Benson & Hedges Trophy was a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament that was held in Spain from 1988 to 1991. It was a mixed pairs event that was an unofficial money event on both the <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a> and <a href="Ladies%20European%20Tour">Ladies European Tour</a>.
The tournament was held in November, after the conclusion of the main Order of Merit schedule, at a different venue each year.
